2006-04-21

Spinning On Air: Espers and Psych-Folk

Me, like it seems so many people, have only recently discovered the beautiful music that Philadelphia band Espers have been producing - WNYC have a live performance and interview for our delectation - I'm listening now and my knees are a little wobbly at the lush, ambient, folkiness of it all - WNYC - Spinning On Air: Espers and Psych-Folk (May 28, 2004)
Update:Another Espers set on WFMU
